content: We took a large group photo on our island with stacked robots and a few folks on the balcony of the saloon. Hoping to see the results of that!

@Rishabh Verma I've removed your post. All advertisements from positions need to be submitted as a PM to @Grahame Grieve so he can post in the appropriate stream (which is locked to public posts). Second, when you make posts, please make sure to choose an appropriate topic.
